sentences.en: A free sample is enclosed with the compliments of the manufacturer.
sentences.cn: 内附厂方敬赠的免费样品.

sentences.en: A manufacturer can amplify the demand of a product by advertising widely.
sentences.cn: 厂商能用大做广告的方法来扩大人们对产品的需求.

sentences.en: A manufacturer negligently made and marketed a car with defective brakes.
sentences.cn: 某厂家由于疏忽，制造并销售了一款刹车系统存在缺陷的汽车。

sentences.en: About 60 per cent of an average car is sourced from outside of the manufacturer.
sentences.cn: 一辆普通汽车上大约有60%的部件是由制造商以外的其他供应商提供的。
务必按厂家的用法说明使用。

sentences.en: Buy direct from the manufacturer and cut out the middleman .
sentences.cn: 直接从生产厂家购买，绕过中间商。

sentences.en: Change the filter cartridge as often as instructed by the manufacturer.
sentences.cn: 按照生产厂家的使用说明，经常更换过滤筒。

sentences.en: Prices are laid down by the manufacturer.
Read the manufacturer’s instructions before using your new dishwasher.
sentences.cn: 使用新洗碗机之前，请先阅读厂家的说明书。

sentences.en: She designs for a coat manufacturer.
sentences.cn: 她为一家外衣制造厂设计图样.

sentences.en: That manufacturer outstripped all his competitors in sales last year.
sentences.cn: 那个制造商家去年的销售量超过了所有竞争对手.

sentences.en: The fridge was sent back to the manufacturers.
sentences.cn: 那台冰箱被退还给厂家了。

sentences.en: The manufacturer invoiced our company for two typewriters.
sentences.cn: 制造厂家给我公司开了一张两部打字机的发票.

sentences.en: The shoe manufacturer had several outlets.
sentences.cn: 那家制鞋厂商有几家代销店.

sentences.en: The shop claims to have sold computers below the manufacturer's cost price for three years.
sentences.cn: 该商店自称3年来一直以低于生产成本的价格出售电脑。

sentences.en: There were several possibilities open to each manufacturer.
sentences.cn: 每个制造商都可以有几种不同的选择。

sentences.en: They are the leading manufacturer in both defence and commercial products.
sentences.cn: 在军工产品和民用产品的制造方面，他们都处于领先地位。

phrases.tran_cn: 原始设备制造商；初始设备厂家

trans.tran_cn: 制造商，制造厂，厂主，[经]厂商
trans.tran_en: a company that makes large quantities of goods
